title: President Donald J. Trump Secures Funding to Care for Our Veterans, Rebuild Our Military, and Invest in Our Infrastructure – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
September 21, 2018
My pledge to you, our noble warriors, is that my Administration will support you, and your loved ones, and your amazing families every single day, now and always.
						President Donald J. Trump					CARING FOR OUR VETS: President Donald J. Trump is signing legislation that provides historic funding to care for our Nation’s veterans.BUILDING OUR DEFENSES: The legislation provides billions of dollars in critical funding to further President Trump’s national security priorities and rebuild military infrastructure.INVESTING IN INFRASTRUCTURE AND ENERGY: The legislation invests in American infrastructure and energy development.
